UniprotID	Q9UL45
Accession	Q9UL45
EntryName	BL1S6_HUMAN
ProteinName	Biogenesis of lysosome-related organelles complex 1 subunit 6 (BLOC-1 subunit 6) (Pallid protein homolog) (Pallidin) (Syntaxin 13-interacting protein)
GeneName	BLOC1S6 PA PLDN
Length	172
Function	Component of the BLOC-1 complex, a complex that is required for normal biogenesis of lysosome-related organelles (LRO), such as platelet dense granules and melanosomes. In concert with the AP-3 complex, the BLOC-1 complex is required to target membrane protein cargos into vesicles assembled at cell bodies for delivery into neurites and nerve terminals. The BLOC-1 complex, in association with SNARE proteins, is also proposed to be involved in neurite extension. May play a role in intracellular vesicle trafficking, particularly in the vesicle-docking and fusion process.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Membrane
Disorder	0.9269,0.8966,0.7916,0.8013,0.7982,0.8493,0.8872,0.7951,0.6948,0.5992,0.6427,0.6322,0.6375,0.7415,0.7369,0.7415,0.7369,0.7369,0.6482,0.5992,0.5951,0.5992,0.6269,0.7595,0.7672,0.7951,0.7547,0.6183,0.6136,0.7415,0.8343,0.7331,0.7672,0.6576,0.6482,0.6183,0.6043,0.5342,0.4685,0.5620,0.5758,0.4801,0.4541,0.4685,0.4369,0.3631,0.2849,0.2849,0.3599,0.3740,0.2951,0.3149,0.3948,0.3286,0.4186,0.4017,0.3872,0.3872,0.4149,0.4582,0.3807,0.3807,0.4582,0.4149,0.4087,0.4119,0.4901,0.5758,0.5055,0.4369,0.4507,0.4507,0.4292,0.4220,0.4220,0.4256,0.4409,0.4507,0.3807,0.3740,0.3872,0.3566,0.3426,0.3460,0.3356,0.3460,0.3392,0.3087,0.2399,0.3053,0.2849,0.3599,0.4051,0.3321,0.2399,0.2849,0.2849,0.2575,0.2399,0.3286,0.2541,0.2752,0.3460,0.3460,0.2715,0.2849,0.2849,0.2064,0.2164,0.2715,0.2715,0.3286,0.2541,0.2575,0.2541,0.3566,0.3807,0.3667,0.3910,0.3983,0.3807,0.3840,0.3667,0.3807,0.3807,0.4256,0.4149,0.3948,0.4051,0.4119,0.4186,0.4087,0.4220,0.4901,0.5017,0.5854,0.5665,0.4766,0.4831,0.4801,0.4831,0.4901,0.5758,0.5807,0.5901,0.6043,0.6322,0.5951,0.5992,0.6991,0.6991,0.6991,0.7036,0.6136,0.6136,0.5951,0.5901,0.6322,0.7036,0.6991,0.6948,0.6755,0.6576,0.6427,0.6269,0.6089,0.5854,0.5620,0.7331,0.7209,0.7036,0.6806
